description: This stop is mentioned only by Irwin in a list of stops, where it appears at 16' pitch. We can only assume that it is a softer version of the Fagotto. Examples None known. Contributions welcome. Bibliography Irwin[1]: Musette. FOOTER Original site compiled by Edward L. Stauff. For educational use only. EchoFagotto.html - Last updated 27 February 2000. Home Full Index
